email-filter-allow-list.name: Sign-Up email filtering (allow list)
email-filter-allow-list.description: This template only allows signup with emails from specified domains.

question.name: DOMAINALLOWLIST
question.message: Enter a comma-delimited list of allowed email domains (example: 'mydomain.com, myotherdomain.com').

email-filter-deny-list.name: Sign-Up email filtering (deny list)
email-filter-deny-list.description: This template prevents signup with emails from specified domains.

question.name: DOMAINDENYLIST
question.message: Enter a comma-delimited list of disallowed email domains (example: 'mydomain.com, myotherdomain.com').
